Course_short: BCA (CU)
Course_full: Bachelor of Computer Applications
Description: Bachelor of Computer Applications is a 3-year undergraduate programme. It is extended over six semesters. The course is designed to bridge the gap between IT industries and institutes by incorporating the latest developments into the curriculum. CHRIST (Deemed to be University) has an excellent group of dedicated faculty and experts from the IT industry, guiding the students. An exclusive and well-equipped lab for the department with a network of latest microprocessor based computers and software installed, provides hands-on training in various fields of computers, for a very fast leased internet line which helps the students to update themselves with the recent trends in the industry. The university has a placement cell to guide our young software professionals seeking, career opportunities in the IT industry.

Course_short: BSc CMS (CU)
Course_full: Bachelor of Science in Computer Sc, Maths, Statistics

Course_short: BSc CME (CU)
Course_full: Bachelor of Science in Computer Sc, Maths, Electronics

Course_short: BSc Animation
Course_full: Bachelor of Science in Animation with International Moving Image Society, UK
Description: Jain (Deemed-to-be University) offers B.Sc in Animation to prepare students for the animation industry. The course teaches students the art of breathing life into characters, various concepts about visualization, imagination, sketching, coloring techniques through which they can bring out the expression and essence of the characters. It trains them to showcase their creativity and imagination, and develop the right aptitude.

Course_short: BSc BcGBt
Course_full: Bachelor of Science in Biochemistry, Genetics and Biotechnology
Description:
The program, B.Sc. in Biochemistry, Genetics, and Biotechnology offered at Jain (Deemed-to-be University) gives students an added advantage to widen their knowledge and concepts.

B.Sc. in Biochemistry, Genetics, and Biotechnology is a study of all living forms, micro and macro organisms. Genetics deals with the study of genes carrying information and determines the inheritance of the features in living organisms. Biochemistry is a study of molecular science that deals with living processes by considering an organism’s biological molecules like their functions and interactions with themselves as well as the molecules in the environment. Biotechnology is a combination of biology and technology which deals with the aspects of using living systems ranging from microorganisms to macroscopic systems for the benefit of human kind.

The program will prepare students to pursue research and higher studies such as MSc or PhD, and develop scientific aptitude and critical thinking in them.

Course_short: BSc CMBt
Course_full: Bachelor of Science in Chemistry, Microbiology, Biotechnology
Description: The program, B.Sc in Chemistry, Microbiology and Biotechnology at Jain (Deemed-to-be University) provides students with the knowledge of life sciences and concepts of chemistry such as thermodynamics, chemical bonding, bio chemistry and other aspects of chemistry. It gives a holistic approach with equal emphasis on all three core subjects. The course is application oriented and will enable students to develop scientific and critical thinking abilities.

Course_short: BSc in Digital Film Making
Course_full: Bachelor of Science in Digital Film Making integrated with International Moving Image Society, UK
Description: The minimum qualification required to apply is a pass in the 10+2 Science, Commerce, Arts examination in PUC / ISC / CBSE or an equivalent board with Physics, Chemistry and Biology as core subjects.

Course_short: BSc Gamming
Course_full: Bachelor of Science in Gaming with International Moving Image Society, UK
Description: Jain (Deemed-to-be University) offers one of the most popular career choices among the youth, that is, B.Sc in Gaming. The course is designed in a way where students will learn the principle method of designing gaming code, principles of programing, and creative writing and designing. B.Sc in Gaming is integrated with International Moving Image Society, UK (Chartered Body). International Moving Image Society (IMIS) was born out of the British Kinematograph, Sound and Television Society (BKSTS) in 2016. The BKSTS originated from the London Branch of Society of Motion Picture Engineers (now known as SMPTE). The mission of IMIS is to serve technical and creative skills in the fields of animation, gaming, feature films, television, commercials, music videos, and short films as well as techniques for future emerging formats for consumption for its members.

Course_short: BSc PMCs
Course_full: Bachelor of Science in Physics, Mathematics, Computer Science
Description:
The course, B.Sc in Physics, Mathematics, and Computer Science provides a comprehensive understanding of the concepts pertaining to the three subjects and strives to meet the ever growing demands of the industries and prepare students for higher studies and research.

The course is application oriented that develops scientific and critical thinking abilities in students. The graduates in B.Sc. PMCs are in high demand from a broad range of employers, with varying career options.

Course_short: BSc RePCs
Course_full: Bachelor of Science in Renewable Energy, Physics, Computer Science
Description:
With the fast depletion of energy resources, environment pollution, and global warming increasing at an alarming rate, a degree in Renewable Energy is the need of the hour. The B.Sc degree in Renewable Energy offered at Jain (Deemed-to-be University) teaches students about management and technical skills for efficient use of renewable energy sources like solar energy, wind energy etc. They will also learn the uses of clean energy, manufacturing and promotion of renewable energy, and how an energy conservation system can reduce the major challenges our environment is facing today.

This program with the combination of Computer Science and Physics will help students deal with the technology and Physics behind the natural resources. As the government rolls out various renewable energy policies and benefits, there will soon be a rising demand for subject experts in the field of renewable energy, particularly in the field of solar and wind energy. Use of renewable energy helps to reduce carbon footprint and helps society deal with issues like global warming.

Course_short: BSc Graphics & VFX
Course_full: Bachelor of Science in Graphics & VFX with Arena Certified Expert in Graphic Design & VFX
Description:
Jain (Deemed-to-be University) in association with Arena Animation offers dual certification courses to students, wherein the students will be a part of Jain (Deemed-to-be University) and get Arena Animation’s skill development certification. Today’s growing young population calls for a perpetually expanding media and entertainment Industry with an even wider range of viewing options than before. The Graphics and VFX Course is a comprehensive course that trains student’s end-to-end in all aspects of graphic design, visual effects, fundamentals and techniques of VFX, Animation - 2D and 3D, typography, digital filmmaking, FX, Dynamics and simulation to make them job-ready.

Jain (Deemed-to-be University) in association with Arena Animation offers dual certification courses to students, wherein the students will be a part of Jain (Deemed-to-be University) and get Arena Animation’s skill development certification. Today’s growing young population calls for a perpetually expanding media and entertainment Industry with an even wider range of viewing options than before. The Graphics and VFX Course is a comprehensive course that trains student’s end-to-end in all aspects of graphic design, visual effects, fundamentals and techniques of VFX, Animation - 2D and 3D, typography, digital filmmaking, FX, Dynamics and simulation to make them job-ready.

Course_short: BSc Forensic Science
Course_full: Bachelor of Science (Professional)in Forensic Science
Description: Forensic Science has become the most crucial part of modern judicial system. The course, B.Sc in Forensic Science at Jain (Deemed-to-be-University) a 3-year graduate course deals with the application of scientific knowledge in crime investigation and the study of the human anatomy. In this course, students learn all aspects of forensic science such as how clues can be collected from a crime scene, physical evidence such as hair, blood, and fingerprints that are taken to the laboratories to present them as evidence in court. The course will enable students to develop scientific principles of conducting investigation, technical skills, scientific aptitude, and an inquisitive mind with keen observational skills, and prepare them to handle work pressure that can come from the judiciary, police, and administration besides, highlighting the importance of ethics as a working professional. With the increasing crime rates in India, the demand for forensic scientists has only been growing.

Course_short: BSc Data Science and Analytics
Course_full: Integrated with Institute of Analytics + Royal Economics Society, UK + Royal Statistical Society
Description:
The course is accredited by Institute of Analytics (IoA) and students will be eligible for graduate membership of IoA after the course completion. They will eligible for membership at the Royal Statistical Society (RSS).

The program instils scientific aptitude, innovative, and critical thinking ability in students to enable them to conduct research and interpret data driven investigation, analyze qualitative and quantitative data through in-depth knowledge, and arrive at scientific solutions. They will also be able to decode patterns and trends of various data, which will lead to effective solutions and making the decision-making process easy.

IoA is a professional body for analytics and data science professionals in UK. It promotes greater awareness, understanding, and innovation in analytics. The RSS is the world’s leading organization to promote the importance of statistics and data, and a professional body for all statisticians and data analysts. Students will be registered as student members at the beginning of the course and will be progressed to graduate membership on graduation.

Course_short: BTech in AI & ML
Course_full: Bachelor of Technology in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
Description: Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Learning and Machine Learning) is a 4 year, 8 semester Undergraduate program aimed at studying, designing, developing, implementing, support and management of computer-based information systems. Students under this course learn advanced learning solutions imparting knowledge of advanced innovations like machine learning, often called deep learning and artificial intelligence. This specialisation is designed to enable students to build intelligent machines, software, or applications with a cutting-edge combination of machine learning, analytics, and visualization technologies. This course discusses AI methods based on different fields, including neural networks, signal processing, control, and data mining, in order to present a unified treatment of machine learning problems and solutions. This course emphases on to develop the necessary skills for the students to sustain in today’s industrial expectation, in pursuit of excellence by keeping high personal and professional values and ethics.

Course_short: Btech in Data Science
Course_full: Bachelor of Technology Data Science
Description:
Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science) is a 4 year, 8 semesters undergraduate program which is a new, exponentially growing field that consists of a set of tools and techniques used to extract useful information from data. The program encompasses data Science as an interdisciplinary, problem-solving oriented subject that learns to apply scientific techniques to practical problems. The course curriculum involves a blend of data inference, algorithm development, and technology to analytically solve complex problems. The program imparts a confluence of skills in three major areas of mathematical expertise, technology hacking skills, and business strategy and acumen. 

The core of this program is the ultimate use of enormous data in creative ways to generate business value. Hidden insights are brought to the fore to enable companies to make smarter business decisions. Data Science program orients on practical classes and self-study during the preparation of datasets and programming of data analysis tasks. This course emphasis on to develop the necessary skills for the students to sustain in today’s industrial expectation, in the pursuit of excellence by keeping high personal and professional values and ethics.

Course_short: BTech in IoT
Course_full: Bachelor of Technology in Internet Of Things
Description: Computer Science and Engineering (IoT) is a 4 year, 8-semester Undergraduate program aimed in imparting a firm foundation in computer science wireless communication and computer networks. The program aims to train students with systematic professional knowledge and strong practical skills in the fields of computer technology communications networks and IT that provides a wide range of applications in the Internet of Things.

Course_short: BTech in Computer Science and Engineering (CU)
Course_full: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering
Description: The program equips students with a strong skill for sensor network design and network planning for IoT. The topics include- Introduction to IoT Understanding IoT in Market Perspective Data and Knowledge Management and use of Devices in IoT Technology Understanding IoT Architecture and the application of IoT in various technologies. These course emphases on to develop the necessary skills for the students to sustain in today’s industrial expectation, in the pursuit of excellence by keeping high personal and professional values and ethics.

Course_short: BTech in Information Technology
Course_full: Bachelor of Technology in Information Technology
Description: When computer and communications technologies are combined, the result is information technology, or "infotech". There is a swift convergence in the areas of computing and communications as a result of relations developing in the data and information environment .IT professionals perform a variety of duties that range from installing applications to designing complex computer networks and information databases, data management, networking, engineering computer hardware, database and software design as well as the management and administration of entire systems. The goal of the Department is thus to cater to all the above needs and prepare students both in theoretical and practical knowledge to face the challenges of the fast becoming technology world.
